Title: Enacts provisions providing protection to employees from retaliatory actions by employers where such employees report improper business activities
Summary: Enacts provisions providing protection to employees from retaliatory actions by employers where such employees report improper business activities; applicable to employees who in good faith reasonably believe that an improper business activity has or will occur, based on information that the employees reasonably believe to be true; provides remedies and relief.
LawCode: Amd §§740 & 741, Lab L; amd §75-b, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the civil service law, in relation to protection of employees against retaliatory action by employers
